text: "Somewhere Between Ragged and Right" is a 1987 song duet by country artists John Anderson and Waylon Jennings. It is the leading single from his ninth studio album Blue Skies Again. It went to number 23 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 35 in Canadian country charts. ==References== Category:1987 songs Category:Country songs Category:Waylon Jennings songs Category:John Anderson (singer) songs
title: Somewhere Between Ragged and Right
